name: Radio Canada Big
description: CBC/Radio-Canada is Canada's national public broadcaster. Their mandate is to inform, enlighten, and entertain in order to strengthen Canadian culture on radio, television, and digital platforms. Radio Canada Big is a variable font with a weight axis that spans from Regular (400) to Bold (700), offering a spectrum of options to suit diverse design needs. To contribute, see github.com/googlefonts/radiocanadadisplay .
